name: 黃銘智
objective: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，以及相關理論之驗證，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
schedule:
W1.         Solid Geomtry and CAD
W2.         Introduction to Pro/Engineer system
W3.         Constraints and Geometry
W4-5.      Feature-based modeling techniques.
W6.         Model setup and display
W7-9.     Advanced modeling skills
W10-11. Make a manufacturable object
W12.      Design change and modify
W13-14.Assembly and Explode Mode
W15.      The duplication of design feature: Copy and Pattern
W16-18.Project practice
